Package org.magnos.util

Interface Summary
Ref<E> A reference to some value.
Sleepable Any entity which blocks its thread for some period of time or until some event occurs.
 

Class Summary
AtomicStack<E> An implementation of a Lock-Free Stack.
BlockableQueue<E> A queue implementation which can toggle between blocking and non-blocking mode.
ConcurrentSet<E> A thread safe set of objects.
EnumState<E extends Enum<E>> A Thread-safe Finite State Machine utility.
Files A simple utility for copying file and folder structures.
Gate<T> A gate will block invokers until it is opened.
LockRef<E> An efficient reentrant read-write lock on a reference.
NonNullRef<E> A reference which blocks on get if the interval value is null.
Notifier<T> A dynamic proxy class for notifying a list of listeners.
Release A utility for unblocking blocking calls.
Signal Provides a way for several threads to send signals between each other.
State A Thread-safe Finite State Machine utility.
